job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer (Remote)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: WHAT IS CARBON ALL ABOUTltbrgtltbrgtAt Carbon Health we believe in the power of health of medicine and of technology We aim to create a supportive environment where you can develop your career and continuously refine your craft To support this goal weve built a diverse and passionate team of employees who are all driven to learn from one another and reach Carbon Healths mission of bringing highquality healthcare to everyoneltbrgtltbrgtBe an integral part of our growing DevOps team As a Senior Site Reliability Engineer you will help define the design development and support of our next generation of automated build deployment ampamp infrastructure provisioning systems You will help guide an engineering team that empowers engineers building consistent development environments at scale providing continuous integration tooling that ensures fast iteration lessens developer frustration and ensures what passes staging works in production you will build out deploy tooling to manage a mesh of microservices you will provide for production testing of canary and ab bluegreen needs Your team will prototype new technologies to ensure system availability is always one step ahead of customer and staff demandltbrgtltbrgtThis is an opportunity to use technology to make world class healthcare affordable to the masses empowering medical professionals to serve those in need If you love people and technology we want to meet youltbrgtltbrgtThis role is REMOTE friendly and can be located anywhere in the continental USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtChampion DevOps best practices and standards across all of RampampD and EngineeringltligtltligtSupport and evolve our CICD release pipelinesltligtltligtMaintain and evolve our computing infrastructure focusing on cloud security scaling cost optimization and automationltligtltligtWork with our Security and Privacy teams to ensure application and infrastructure adhere to our policies and controlsltligtltligtPerformance tuning JVMs Databases and configuration settingsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout Youltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of experience in DevOps System or Software Engineeringltligtltligt4 years of experience utilizing Cloud computing EC2 SNSSQS RDSAuroraltligtltligtStrong experience running production applications workloads in AWS CloudltligtltligtExperience administrating technologies at scale such as Kafka ElasticSearch Postgres and RedisltligtltligtDatabase and Data warehouse experience Postgres DynamoDB SnowflakeltligtltligtExperiencing managing and automating Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery CICD using GitHub GitLab Jenkins CircleCI or similar requiredltligtltligtFamiliarity with modern scripting language such as Python RubyltligtltligtAWS Certified a plusltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtPerksltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtForwardthinking transparent and inclusive company cultureltligtltligtCollaborative environment within and across our clinic sites virtual care teams and at HQ in San Franciscoltligtltligt401K with matching contribution and Pretax benefits including Commuter transit ampamp parkingltligtltligtCompetitive compensation with medical dental vision 401K with match FSA Medical FSA Dependent Care and other great benefits for full time ampamp part time employees who work 20 hours a weekltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtA BRIEF HISTORYltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCarbon Health is the leading national healthcare provider with a mission to bring highquality healthcare to everyone Leveraging its unique technology platform Carbon Health provides its patients with omnichannel care seamless care from the same trusted providers at a wide variety of access points including urgent care primary care virtual care popup sites the Carbon Health app and onsite at their employers Carbon Health also provides valuebased care to enterprise partners across a broad range of industries including academia sports entertainment biotechnology and travel Apply today join our team and make an impactltbrgtltbrgtTo learn more about Carbon Health and to stay up to date on what were doing visit httpsblogcarbonhealthcomltbrgtltbrgtWe here at Carbon Health recognize that the key to success lies in valuing the minds experiences and perspectives of people from all walks of life Carbon Health is proud to value diversity and be an equal employment opportunity employer Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance and the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsltbrgtltbrgt
